description:
We currently have an immediate need for an experienced Escrow Assistant for a well established Escrow Company in the Glendale, CA area. The Escrow Assistant will provide support to the Escrow Officer by assisting with opening purchase and refinance Escrow files as well as processing all necessary documents related to Escrow. Candidates must have previous experience working in the Escrow Industry and performing the job tasks of an Escrow Assistant. Only candidates with previous Escrow experience will be considered for this job opportunity. This is a full time temp to hire position paying between $25 to $29 per hour based on experience.

Our Staff is passionate about recruiting and we take pride in matching our candidates with the right clients. Our goal is to insure job satisfaction along with a competitive pay and a positive working environment. We will work hard to help you with your next career move within the Title, Escrow & Mortgage industry.
